subject: Japan Earthquake and Tsunami (2011)
Basketball
Discrimination
Apologies
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Liberty guard Cappie Pondexter’s insensitive Twitter messages about victims of the Japanese earthquake and tsunami drew muted responses from her team and league.
snippet: Liberty guard Cappie Pondexter’s insensitive Twitter messages about victims of the Japanese earthquake and tsunami drew muted responses from her team and league.
